casebody.data:
IN RE: T.T.E. 238A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 17, 2018 Michelle F. Lynch, Attorney at Law, for T.T.E. Janelle Varley, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of October 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of October 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
